// RIMP.Analytics.Tests - LapTimeAnalyzer tests (generated)

using System.Collections.Generic;
using Xunit;
using RIMP.Analytics;

namespace RIMP.Analytics.Tests
{
    public class LapTimeAnalyzerTests
    {
        [Fact]
        public void Analyze_Computes_Stats_From_Two_Samples()
        {
            double a = {{SampleA}};
            double b = {{SampleB}};
            var sut = new LapTimeAnalyzer();

            var stats = sut.Analyze(new List<double> { a, b });

            Assert.Equal(2, stats.Count);
            Assert.InRange(stats.Best, System.Math.Min(a, b) - 1e-9, System.Math.Min(a, b) + 1e-9);
            Assert.InRange(stats.Worst, System.Math.Max(a, b) - 1e-9, System.Math.Max(a, b) + 1e-9);
            var expectedAvg = (a + b) / 2.0;
            Assert.InRange(stats.Average, expectedAvg - 1e-9, expectedAvg + 1e-9);
        }
    }
}
